Description:
Improvement Notice x 2 served,

1) You have not taken all reasonably practicable steps to ensure the safety of yourself and others who may be involved in handling cattle on your farm. The cattle handling system consisting of a crush and gates/mesh fencing is not suitable for ensuring segregation of cattle and persons.

2) You have not ensured that work equipment, the John Deere tractor registration number WP02
DNY, is maintained in an efficient state, efficient working order and good repair. The off-side door
of the cab is missing and is required to be re-instated or replaced.
